meanings.definition: An apartment or dwelling situated on the top floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The penthouse at the top of the building offers a great view of the city.
meanings.sent2: The penthouse is where Mr. Johnson lives on the highest floor.
meanings.sent3: The penthouse on the roof is like a cozy nest above the city.
meanings.sent4: In the penthouse of the building, you feel closer to the sky than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The penthouse is the crown jewel of the entire building.

meanings.definition: A structure on the roof of a building, typically used for storage or mechanical equipment.
meanings.sent1: The penthouse on the roof holds all the building's maintenance tools.
meanings.sent2: The workers accessed the penthouse to fix the air conditioning unit.
meanings.sent3: The penthouse on the roof is like a hidden treasure trove of building supplies.
meanings.sent4: The penthouse on the roof hummed with the sound of machinery.
meanings.sent5: The penthouse on the roof was a maze of pipes and wires.

meanings.definition: A luxurious apartment or living space on the top floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The penthouse on the top floor is where the wealthy businessman resides.
meanings.sent2: The penthouse is the most expensive unit in the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The penthouse on the top floor is like a palace in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The penthouse exudes elegance and sophistication on the highest level.
meanings.sent5: The penthouse is a symbol of opulence and grandeur in the building.
